text:
Italy is doing the loop to gain market shares in Germany   
Sep 02, 2015 eTN   
Italy is among the top 5 of the most popular destinations for German traveller. Reason enough for the Italian hotel market to introduce new and unusual hotels to an interested German tourism industry. The two luxury hotels Capri Tiberio Palace in Capri and the Hotel Le Fontanelle in Tuscany therefore take part in the luxury fair loop - Luxury on our Planet from 10th-13th April in Frankfurt. The exhibition provides a business platform for international luxury hotels where they exclusively meet TOP Buyer from the German speaking markets. 
Capri Tiberio Palace has a privileged and quiet position just a few steps from the famous “Piazzetta”. Capri is an international jet set meeting point for enthusiastic travellers and incurable bon vivants. A glamorous island that has been historically a nest for artists, celebrities and emperors. With an atmosphere that portrays the home of a globetrotter, this luxury boutique hotel, located in the heart of Capri, exhales an eclectic and unique vibe for guests who savour contemporary design, mix & match of patterns and pop-art as well as the myth of the island topped up by five star service. Most of the 46 rooms feature terraces with breathtaking sea views. A traditional Mediterranean and Kosher restaurant, a totally renovated swimming pool and a SPA are located in the premises in order to wrap up this cool spot in the Blue Island. 
Hotel Le Fontanelle, 5 star Hotel located in the Chianti Classico region between Siena and Florence, offers to its Guests sceneries and landscapes of spectacular pristine beauty, for a memorable stay or a private special event. With its 25 rooms divided into five different typologies, the Hotel proposes a special refined comfort, turning into the perfect choice for a pleasant holiday, a romantic honeymoon, spellbound marriages, meetings, a eno-gastronomic path, or simply for a relaxing break in the name of wellbeing and interior peacefulness research. 
There is perhaps no better way of experiencing a country’s history than through its food… So come to enjoy the special touch of our Chef at the prestigious “Restaurant La Colonna” which, with its breathtaking “Belvedere Terrace”, will capture your soul on the unspeakable views of the rolling Chianti hills.
